titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives to encourage continued investment to complete the development of an HIV/AIDS vaccine for the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 11/16/2009--Introduced. Encourages domestic efforts in the public and private sectors to invest in, and complete the development of a vaccine for, the U.S. strain of the HIV/AIDS virus, Clade B.
